facemapping

Class DetectedFace

  • java.lang.Object
    • facemapping.DetectedFace

  • public class DetectedFace
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the information for a detected face and generates a PImage of the overall face.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Robert Tatoian, Warren Godone-Maresca

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private processing.core.PImage frontTexture
      The part of the face texture containing the front of the face
      private float numberFaces
      The number of faces added to the texture so far
      private processing.core.PImage profileTexture
      The part of the face texture containing the sides of the face
      private static int TEXTURE_HEIGHT
      The height of the texture

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DetectedFace()
      Instantiates a detected face object.

      Blends two ARGB pixels together according to the given weight.
      private processing.core.PImage matToPImage(org.opencv.core.Mat m)
      Converts an OpenCV matrix to a PImage.

      Helper method that overlays a newly detected face onto the preexisting texture.

      Updates the face texture with a newly detected frontal face.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DetectedFace

        public DetectedFace()
        Instantiates a detected face object.

    • Method Detail

      • blendPixels

        private int blendPixels(int oldPixel,
                        int newPixel,
                        float weight)
        Blends two ARGB pixels together according to the given weight.
        Parameters:
        oldPixel - The first pixel value
        newPixel - The second pixel value
        weight - The weight of the second pixel value, should be in [0, 1]
        Returns:
        The blended pixel value

      • matToPImage

        private processing.core.PImage matToPImage(org.opencv.core.Mat m)
        Converts an OpenCV matrix to a PImage.
        Parameters:
        m - A matrix of BGR pixels.
        Returns:
        A PImage of ARGB pixels with the same dimensions.

      • overlayFace

        private void overlayFace(processing.core.PImage oldTexture,
                         processing.core.PImage newFace)
        Helper method that overlays a newly detected face onto the preexisting texture. The new texture is given more weight than the preexisting texture. The two textures should have the same dimensions
        Parameters:
        oldTexture - The preexisting texture
        newFace - A texture to be blended into the old texture.

      • toPImage

        public processing.core.PImage toPImage()
        Returns a PImage of the detected face
        Returns:
        A PImage containing the colorized detected face.

      • updateFrontTexture

        public void updateFrontTexture(org.opencv.core.Mat face,
                               float[] leftEye,
                               float[] rightEye)
        Updates the face texture with a newly detected frontal face.
        Parameters:
        face - An OpenCV matrix that contains a frontal face
        leftEye - The coordinates of the left eye, {x, y}
        rightEye - The coordinates of the right eye, {x, y}

      • updateProfileTexture

        public void updateProfileTexture(org.opencv.core.Mat profile,
                                 float[] eyeCoordinates,
                                 boolean facingRight)
        Updates the face texture with a newly detected side profile.
        Parameters:
        profile - An OpenCV matrix containing a side face.
        eyeCoordinates - The coordinates of the eye in the profile, {x, y}
        facingRight - True if the face is facing right, false otherwise
